timeline.bodyText: Rather than logging the error, we should just rethrow it to cause the test to fail (we're being called synchronously).  I'd suggest using Assertions.fail("Unhandled error in subscriber ...", error).  That will give lots of context but also wind up throwing an AssertionError which will almost always bubble all the way up and fail the test (whereas RuntimeException might be caught).
